author: Nintendo of America
description:
Summon the Power of Megazord in Fortnite on Nintendo Switch 2 & Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/fortnite-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1064-01&utm_id=P1064-01  

Starting now, Zordon’s Command Chamber hologram will begin appearing in random matches. Be the first to reach him to call in the Megazord! Pilot it alongside your teammates. Once inside, you’ll work with your team to take down the grossest of the germinates: the Giant Queen. But watch your six, players on the ground will probably be attacking you too! You’ll need to use the full suite of Megazord’s attacks to fight off all threats, big and small. 

#Fortnite #NintendoSwitch #NintendoSwitch2 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NintendoAmerica
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nin
title: Fortnite – Megazord Gameplay Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Two galactic adventures await! Soar through the vast corners of the galaxy, explore and discover all sorts of planets, and use different cosmic power-ups to transform as you put a stop to Bowser's nefarious plans. Plus, a new chapter has been added to the Storybook in Super Mario Galaxy…and a new Storybook appears in Super Mario Galaxy 2! You can also enable the newly added Assist Mode for a smoother space adventure.

Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 launches on Nintendo Switch October 2, 2025: https://ninten.do/6005sWmUb

Pre-orders are available now on Nintendo eShop. The games will also be individually available on Nintendo eShop. Additionally, a free update that adds 4K resolution support* and mouse controls for the second player will be available for Nintendo Switch 2. 

*TV and game must be compatible with 4K resolution. Frame rates are capped at 60 fps for 4K output.

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https:
title: Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 – Overview Trailer – Nintendo Switch

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Two classic Game Boy Advance games will be release on Game Boy Advance – Nintendo Classics!

KLONOA™ Empire of Dreams
The ruler of a distant empire suffers from a serious case of sleepless nights. In his torment, Emperor Jillius passes a law forbidding his loyal subjects from ever dreaming again! One morning, our hero Klonoa and his friend Huepow find themselves in front of the emperor, charged with dreaming of
adventure. As punishment for their crimes, they must defeat the four monsters that plague the lands.

Play as Klonoa and take down enemies with the ever-trusty Wind Bullet. Solve puzzles and collect helpful items like stars as you jump your way through 40 incredible stages! Help Klonoa in his journey to redeem himself and find out just why dreams have become so taboo...

Mr. Driller™2
Join Susumu and Anna as a mysterious outbreak of Blocks threatens the world's existence once more. Armed with a mighty drill, dig deep through multicolored blocks until you reach safety. Not all b
title: Game Boy Advance – September 2025 Games Update
